Quote: His name was Tom Tombstone, and if he had a middle name it was probably Death. But I didnâ€™t call him Tom, or even Mr. Tombstone, because he introduced himself as Robert Winston. And I wondered how this stranger could shake my hand, look me in the eye, smile, and expect me to believe such a bold-faced lie?
Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
